abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is required.

user.title: Entity Metadata
user.description: Persist and restore user-set entity names, icons, visibility, and enabled states.

init.title: Entity Metadata Options
init.description: Configure export/import defaults and one-shot actions.

data.export_all_entities: Export all entities (incl. ones with no overrides)

data_description.auto_import_on_startup: Runs import with merge: true right after HA starts.
data_description.backup_retention: Older backups under /config/etc/entity_metadata/backups/ are pruned after each export.
data_description.export_all_entities: Safe with merge: true. With merge: false, empty {} entries reset name/icon/hidden/disabled.
data_description.export_domains: Optional filter. Leave empty to include all domains.
data_description.export_now: Triggers an immediate export when you click Submit; not saved to options.

export_overrides.name: Export overrides
export_overrides.description: Export entity metadata to overrides.yaml (and optional backup).

include_all.name: Include entities with no overrides
include_all.description: If enabled, export all entities (optionally limited by 'include_domains').

import_overrides.name: Import overrides
import_overrides.description: Import entity metadata from overrides.yaml (or a custom path).

merge.name: Merge
merge.description: Merge with existing values (recommended). If false, unspecified fields are cleared.

strict_entities.name: Strict entities
strict_entities.description: Fail if any referenced entity_id does not exist.
